sources_attempted.name: Shark Official France (sharkclean.fr)
sources_attempted.notes: Official manufacturer specs - most reliable source

sources_attempted.name: Indors EU
sources_attempted.notes: Provided motor power (309W) and tank capacity (0.7L)

sources_attempted.name: RTINGS Review
sources_attempted.error: JavaScript-heavy page, content not accessible via WebFetch

sources_attempted.name: Amazon.com
sources_attempted.error: JavaScript-heavy page, content not accessible via WebFetch

sources_attempted.name: Modern Castle
sources_attempted.workaround: Used WebSearch to extract noise level data
sources_attempted.notes: 403 error on direct access, got noise levels via search results

sources_attempted.name: TechRadar Review
sources_attempted.error: CSS/schema markup only, no review content accessible

sources_attempted.name: WebSearch aggregation
sources_attempted.notes: Aggregated data from multiple review sources via search results

challenges_encountered: Many review sites (RTINGS, Amazon) are JavaScript-heavy and inaccessible via WebFetch
Energy consumption class not published by manufacturer or retailers
Some sources use imperial units requiring conversion
Noise level varies significantly by power mode (64.9dB to 84dB range)
Weight specifications inconsistent (handheld vs full unit)
workarounds_used: Used WebSearch to aggregate data from multiple sources when direct WebFetch failed
Cross-referenced official French site with international review sites
Extracted specs from search result snippets when full pages inaccessible

data_quality.cross_validation: high - multiple sources confirmed key specs
